dd.p: <note> when do we talk about types???
There is no specific markup for note in MDITA

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processors SHOULD render the content of the alternate text component as alternative text for an image that references this component

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of note in an XDITA topic.
section.pre:
Profits, fun, and flavor under the same brand
Initial investment:

$700

The initial investment price includes the first franchise fee payment
Franchise fee:

$200

section.title: HDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of note in an HDITA topic.
section.pre:
Profits, fun, and flavor under the same brand

Initial investment:

$700

The initial investment price includes the first franchise fee payment

Franchise fee:

$200
